content:
Circles!   Well, tbh it’s quite a stretch to call these circles, it’s a bunch of deformed eggs at best.
However, I now somehwat know that I have a lot to work on, a bit daunting but I have a clear path.
I’ll continue to draw more circles for the next couple of days until I get the hang of it, then I’ll move on.
description: This is the moment of embarking
title: Let's start with circles

content:
Failed Attemps I’ve been wanting to start learning how to draw for quite some time now but for some reason I always ended up dropping it, probably commitment issues xd. Well, whatever the reasons are I would like to try again and I think this time I’ve set up measures to minimize failure, this site is one of said measure. Futhermore, this time I have a clear actionable goal in mind
The Plan I’ll do my best to do daily exercices every morning for 1-3 hours and I’ll make sure to take not toddler steps not even baby steps I will take Hallucigenia steps, if there’s anything I learned from past failures it would be knowing that taking big step and failing is the most discouraging things in the entire universe.
And by Hallucigenia steps I mean it, I’ll start with primitive shapes tomorrow.
description: This is the moment of embarking
title: Auspicious Start

content:
Hi, I’m Posei a spaghet maker, the less common term for it is programmer, mainly doing mobile stuff with flutter. I also like other stuff such as music and art but suck at creating both, that’s why I created this blog, I want to document my learning process on both so maybe I can be more consistent.
This site is created with Hugo
It’s awesome, go check it out!
title: About
